ISSUE.TITLE: sitemap.xml file should not be a localizable URL (do not include a language code to URL when you have multiple languages)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Create two languages (e.g. /en/ and /ru/) 2. Open www.store.com/sitemap.xml. It'll redirect to www.store.com/en/sitemap.xml 3. Actually www.store.com/en/sitemap.xml and www.store.com/ru/sitemap.xml will be the same 4. There is no need to localize this URL. We can have only the default one - www.store.com/sitemap.xml because it already includes all alternative (localized) URLs of all web pages of website

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5217 Sitemap moved to no localized root (without language SEO-code)
